definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: Moreover, it is the most widespread and best-known anthology of T'ang poems in the English-speaking world.
sentences.chinese: 同樣，在英語世界裏傳播範圍最廣的唐詩選本也是它。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, The fiction anthology has also provided a model for reading and writing.
sentences.chinese: 同時，小說選本還爲閱讀和創作提供了範本。

sentences.english: Selected works is one of the important form of the ancient literary theory criticizes in our country.
sentences.chinese: 選本是我國古代文學理論批評的重要形式之一。

sentences.english: Ensure that the final map of the final form of Chinese poetry anthology.
sentences.chinese: 保證最後形成中華詩歌地圖最終選本。

sentences.english: The trend of imitating Song Poems in Qing Dynasty brought about the prosperity of Song poems.
sentences.chinese: 清代學宋風行，帶來了宋詩選本的繁榮。
